title: SAT100 Unit 1 Current Non Sustainable Agriculture Practices

tasks.task: Assign physical tasks related to farm operations based on the lecture transcript.
subtasks: Identify maintenance and tillage practices discussed (e.g., plowing, disking, cultivation, no-till).
Note synthetic fertilizer application and associated issues (soil depletion, nutrient runoff).
Outline pest and weed control methods (herbicides, insecticides) and their environmental impacts.
Describe the shift from traditional family farms to large corporate operations and associated environmental concerns.
Identify limitations of current agricultural practices (soil degradation, water scarcity, biodiversity loss).
